ROW.DATDSC: select substr(b.id,6) mm,mny2,mny1,round(decode(mny2,0,'',(mny1-mny2)/mny2*100),2) bl from ( select to_char(jkfsrq,'mm') mm,sum([%TAXTYPSTR])/[%UNIT] mny1 from v_tax_kpdata where to_char(jkfsrq,'yyyy')=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') group by to_char(jkfsrq,'mm') ) a1,( select to_char(jkfsrq,'mm') mm,sum([%TAXTYPSTR])/[%UNIT] mny2 from v_tax_kpdata where to_char(jkfsrq,'yyyy')=decode('[%YYYY]'-1,'',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]'-1) group by to_char(jkfsrq,'mm') ) a2,v_yyyy_mm b where substr(b.id,6)=a1.mm(+) and substr(b.id,6)=a2.mm(+) and substr(b.id,0,4)=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') order by b.id
select * from V_TAX_ZSXM where id in ([%IDS])
